column4: Two weeks ago I could record audio using the Sound Recorder application that comes standard with Ubuntu, but trying the same thing now results in a silent recording.  I don't remember changing anything about my system except making the usual security updates.  Any ideas?
hate to be too obvious, but have you checked the mute switch on your mic?
Yggdrasil yes, lemme see if I can find it
Yeah, I looked for something like that, but didn't find anything.  Where would you look?
